about-me.about-me-text: Hello, my name is Guilherme Fortunato Machado, I am currently 16 years old and I live in Paran√°, since I was 9 years old I have had contact with programming and game development, at 12 years old I created my first website, I made the Fullstack course from Danki Code and today I have certificates as Game Developer, Web Developer and Application Programmer, I have knowledge in languages such as PHP, JavaScript and Lua as a programming language for games. I'm interested in work or freelance work in the Fullstack or Mobile area, and I'm also learning Python and in the future Ruby. I have knowledge in technologies such as React JS, React Native and a little NodeJS, Front-End Frameworks such as Bootstrap, Materialize and SASS, and in databases what I have I have more knowledge of MySQL, I also have some knowledge of MongoDB.
